p: This review follows the PRISMA Journal Publishing protocol workflow [ 18]; the PubMed and Web of Science databases were screened from 11 January to 15 August 2019, with keywords presented on Supplementary File 1. Full-text articles in English language containing information on mosquito vector competence were selected. Articles in other languages containing critical information were included in the data set as “identified by other sources”. The PRISMA flow chart is described in Figure 1.
